# Aavedan Patra

## About
Aavedan Patra (https://aavedanpatra.in) provides Hindi application letter templates (आवेदन पत्र).
The site includes formats and examples for school, college, office, government work, jobs, leave,
certificates, loans, admissions, and scholarships.

Content is written in simple Hindi for Indian users.

## Primary Topics
- Hindi Application Letters (आवेदन पत्र)
- Application Templates
- Leave Applications
- Job Applications
- School & College Applications
- Government Application Formats
- Certificate Requests
- Loan & Admission Applications

## Audience
Students, professionals, job seekers, and general Indian users looking for Hindi application formats.

## Content Structure
- Category-based application letters
- Individual application templates
- Ready-to-copy formats with examples
